abstract: We know that Warren E. Buffett is on the prowl for a $40 billion to $60 billion deal. Now that the credit markets have sidelined potential private equity rivals, the Berkshire Hathaway chief may have an even easier go of it, Bloomberg News suggests.
lead_paragraph: We know that Warren E. Buffett is on the prowl for a $40 billion to $60 billion deal. Now that the credit markets have sidelined potential private equity rivals, the Berkshire Hathaway chief may have an even easier go of it, Bloomberg News suggests.

headline.main: Playing the Buffett Buying Game Again
